com.github.lucapino.jira

Class ReleaseNotesMailMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.lucapino.jira.AbstractJiraMojo
        • com.github.lucapino.jira.ReleaseNotesMailMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="mail-release-notes")
 @Execute(goal="generate-release-notes")
public class ReleaseNotesMailMojo
extends AbstractJiraMojo
    Goal that generates release notes based on a version in a JIRA project.
    Author:
    Luca Tagliani

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doExecute() 
      protected MailSender getActualMailSender()
      Returns the identify of the mail sender according to the plugin's configuration: if the mailSender parameter is set, it is returned if no fromDeveloperId is set, the first developer in the list is returned if a fromDeveloperId is set, the developer with that id is returned if the developers list is empty or if the specified id does not exist, an exception is thrown
      protected void sendMessage()
      Send the email.

      • sendMessage

        protected void sendMessage()
                    throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Send the email.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the mail could not be sent

      • getActualMailSender

        protected MailSender getActualMailSender()
                                  throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Returns the identify of the mail sender according to the plugin's configuration:
        • if the mailSender parameter is set, it is returned
        • if no fromDeveloperId is set, the first developer in the list is returned
        • if a fromDeveloperId is set, the developer with that id is returned
        • if the developers list is empty or if the specified id does not exist, an exception is thrown
        Returns:
        the mail sender to use
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the mail sender could not be retrieved
